select t_outer.function_id, t_outer.function_code, t_outer.function_name from (
( select t_function.id function_id, t_function.function_code, t_function.function_name from sec_function t_function, sec_function_permission_rel t_function_permission_rel, sec_permission_resource_rel t_permission_resource_rel where t_function.id = t_function_permission_rel.function_id and t_function_permission_rel.permission_id = t_permission_resource_rel.permission_id and t_permission_resource_rel.resource_id = #{resourceId} )
union all
( select t_function.id function_id, t_function.function_code, t_function.function_name from sec_function t_function, sec_function_resource_rel t_function_resource_rel where t_function.id = t_function_resource_rel.function_id and t_function_resource_rel.resource_id = #{resourceId} )
) t_outer group by t_outer.function_id, t_outer.function_code, t_outer.function_name order by t_outer.function_code asc
